General.Name: Pasifik Gayrimenkul Yatirim Ortakligi AS
General.Description: Pasifik Gayrimenkul Yatirim Ortakligi A.S. focuses on operating as a REIT company in Turkey. It has various mixed projects. The company is based in Ankara, Turkey.
